attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LDEoWPPHBm5D6Q4FCAm_description
attribs.current: Thanks to your elf blood, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LDEoZtap-Inx6-qukOO_description
attribs.current: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LDErA69a2q3bzedN3Ot_description
attribs.current: +2 Damage when using a single one-handed weapon

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LDErMaldKyQUoZSWWt2_description
attribs.current: Heal 1d10 + level hit points as a bonus action (once between rests)

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LDSEdutvJZefs8mzkgx_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Slashing, Secondary Damage: 1d10, Melee  2, Melee  1, Melee  3, Melee Attacks +1,Secondary Damage Type: 2 Handed,Melee Damage: 3,Melee Damage: 3,Melee Damage: 3,Melee Damage: 3,Melee Damage: 3,Melee Damage: 3,Melee Damage: 3,Melee Damage: 3

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LDSULUgYofxdyotZV3K_description
attribs.current: Starting at 2nd level, you can push yourself beyond your normal limits for a moment. On Your Turn, you can take one additional action on top of your regular action and a possible Bonus Action.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LDhzcVQqe36zF0qSTNS_description
attribs.current:
Starting at 1st	level, you	gain	the ability to place a baleful curse on an enemy. As a bonus action, choose one creature you can see within 30 feet of you. The target is cursed for 1 minute. Until the curse ends, you gain the following benefits: 

• You gain a bonus to damage rolls against the cursed target. The bonus equals your proficiency bonus.

• Any attack roll you make against the cursed target is a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

• If the cursed target dies, you regain hit	points equal to	your	warlock level + your Charisma modifier. 

You can’t use this feature again until you finish a short or long rest.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LDi1RfZvCUDLXHBI7N2_description
attribs.current:
At 1st level, you acquire the training necessary to effectively arm yourself for battle. You gain proficiency with medium armor, shields, and martial weapons.

The influence of your patron also allows you to mystically channel your will through a particular weapon. Whenever you finish a long rest, you can touch one weapon that you are proficient with and that lacks the two-handed property. When you attack with that weapon, you can use your Charisma modifier, instead of Strength or Dexterity, for the attack and damage rolls. This benefit lasts until you finish a long rest. If you later gain the Pact of the Blade feature, this benefit extends to every pact weapon you conjure with that feature, no matter the weapon's type.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LDi1rYtLPYg21G9Xng0_spelldescription
attribs.current:
A beam of crackling energy streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 force damage.

The spell creates more than one beam when you reach higher levels: two beams at 5th level, three beams at 11th level, and four beams at 17th level. You can direct the beams at the same target or at different ones. Make a separate attack roll for each beam.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LDi26SnsA2ZSyAdQGoO_spelldescription
attribs.current:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it as an action. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

You can use your action to control the hand. You can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial. You can move the hand up to 30 feet each time you use it.

The hand can't attack, activate magical items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LDi2AnZiiYca44mCbBa_spelldescription
attribs.current: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from magic missile.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LDnp5AZsu3y8DRn8ZC9_spelldescription
attribs.current: Until the spell ends, you deal an extra 1d6 necrotic damage to the target when you attack it. Also, choose one ability when you cast the spell. The target has disadvantage on ability checks made with the chosen ability. If the target drops to 0 hit points before this spell ends, you can use a bonus action on a turn of yours to curse a new creature. A Remove Curse cast on the target ends this spell early.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LDtdWBnlps6ZfcFbAO7_spellcastingtime
attribs.current: 1 reaction, which you take in  response to being damaged by a creature within 60  feet of you that you can see

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LDtdWBnlps6ZfcFbAO7_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You point your finger, and the creature that damaged you is momentarily surrounded by hellish flames.The creature must make a Dexterity saving  throw. It takes 2d10 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. 

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a  spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage  increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LDtdyRtuppFzG3FXwpD_description
attribs.current: You can see normally in darkness, both magical and non-magical, to a distance of 120 feet.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LEhR5D5l9TfLkYkL5cr_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: An eyelash encased in gum arabic

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LEhR5D5l9TfLkYkL5cr_spelldescription
attribs.current: A creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is invisible as long as it is on the target's person. The spell ends for a target that attacks or casts a spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LEhR5D5l9TfLkYkL5cr_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEhRLH7UZ2Zf2UOrs0Y_description
attribs.current: Any weapon you create using your Pact of the Blade feature is a +1 weapon. This invocation doesn't affect a magic weapon you transformed into your pact weapon.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LEhRm1qRhorzYYuD6vF_description
attribs.current:
You can use your action to create a pact weapon in your empty hand. You can choose the form that this melee weapon takes each time you create it. You are proficient with it while you wield it. This weapon counts as magical for the purpose of overcoming Resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.
Your pact weapon disappears if it is more than 5 feet away from you for 1 minute or more. It also disappears if you use this feature again, if you dismiss the weapon (no action required), or if you die.
You can transform one Magic Weapon into your pact weapon by performing a Special ritual while you hold the weapon. You perform the ritual over the course of 1 hour, which can be done during a short rest. You can then dismiss the weapon, shunting it into an extradimensional space, and it appears whenever you create your pact weapon thereafter. You can’t affect an artifact or a sentient weapon in this way. The weapon ceases being your pact weapon if you die, if you perform the 1-hour ritual on a different weapon, or if you use a 1-hour ritual to break your bond to it. The weapon appears at your feet if it is in the extradimensional space when the bond breaks.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LFtGArjGyaZ-F1u9zSk_description
attribs.current: When you survive to the end of a mission, roll a d10 with disadvantage. Your party recieves an additional ammount of gold for the mission equal to this die roll X 5% of the total monetary gains. You must declare the use of this ability before the DM rewards gold. At level 10 you no longer roll this ability with disadvantage. At level 15 you roll this ability with advantage as you up your hustle game.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LG88A06yL-VVpoOtRo2_description
attribs.current:
You have uncanny aim, you gain the following benefits: 

Increase your Dexterity, Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
Whenever you have advantage on an attack roll using Dexterity, Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma, you can reroll one of the dice once.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LG88wnLnLJtPtnOvoid_spelldescription
attribs.current: The target must pass a Strength save or be pulled up to 10 feet in a straight line to you. If it's moved to within 5 feet of you, it takes 1d8 lightning damage.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LGXu4jWhSeyCWvytso2_description
attribs.current: You can Attack with your pact weapon twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on Your Turn.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LGXue0WlBXqGmZl9urz_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A wing feather from any bird

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LGXue0WlBXqGmZl9urz_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch a willing creature. The target gains a flying speed of 60 feet for the duration. When the spell ends, the target falls if it is still aloft, unless it can stop the fall.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LGXue0WlBXqGmZl9urz_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 3rd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LHEQFKhAf3CVNyEJmmJ_spellcastingtime
attribs.current: 1 reaction, which you take when you see a creature within 60 feet of you casting a spell

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LHEQFKhAf3CVNyEJmmJ_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature in the process of casting a spell

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LHEQFKhAf3CVNyEJmmJ_spelldescription
attribs.current: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell. If the creature is casting a spell of 3rd level or lower, its spell fails and has no effect. If it is casting a spell of 4th level or higher, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability. The DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a success, the creature's spell fails and has no effect.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LHEQFKhAf3CVNyEJmmJ_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the interrupted spell has no effect if its level is less than or equal to the level of the spell slot you used.
